pages.text: The $(item)Heart of Stone$() is cold to the touch, and feels like an urn where frames of bone reside.$(br)It is a $(marked)Rite Tool$() of $(2)大地$(), and it has the ability to apply $(marked)$(t:This effect is used for certain rites)"potential"$() to entities hit with it.
$(o)In the grave you dug for me$()
